data.title: Station Information
data.meta_description: Live times and facilities information for Hull Station
data.text:
Great Value Train Travel

Seat Picker on Hull Trains Services

No Booking Fees

Hull

Hull Paragon station Ferensway Kingston-upon-Hull East Riding of Yorkshire

HU1 3QX

Hull Station | Station Information | Hull Trains

Hull Station can be found within the Hull Paragon Interchange, which is also the home of Hull’s bus station. The original station was opened in 1847. When you arrive, keep an eye out for the bronze statue of celebrated poet Philip Larkin, which was installed at the station in 2010 to mark the 25th anniversary of his death. The station is ideally located to provide access to the city’s many fantastic amenities including popular attractions like the St Stephen's shopping centre, The Deep and Hull Marina. The main entrances/exits for the station are on Ferensway which is an easy walk into the main shopping area of Hull. The station has a WH Smith and Starbucks.

Take a virtual 360-degree tour of Hull station here.

STATION DETAILS

Accessible Booking Office Counter

Accessible Ticket Machines

Customer Help Points

Help Points are available throughout the station to contact a member of our team in an emergency or for information when the ticket office is closed. When using the Help Point our CCTV will be monitoring your position for the duration of the call.

Impaired Mobility Set Down

Induction Loop

National Key Toilets

The accessible toilets are located in the pavilion on the Station Concourse, these toilets are operated by a radar key.

Ramp For Train Access

Staff Help Available

Monday to Sunday – 24 hours

Step Free Access

This station is category A. Step free access is provided from the station entrance to all platforms. This station is staffed for all services. There are train boarding ramps available at this station, and they are also carried on board all TransPennine Express trains.

Wheelchairs Available

This station does not offer

Accessible Public Telephones, Accessible Taxis

Applicable Operators: TransPennine Express

The nearest taxi rank is outside the station.

Customer Service

To speak to a member of our team, please call: 0345 600 1671.

Toilets

The toilets are located in the pavilion on the Station Concourse.
